text: No @worries. No cares. Just float and wait for the wind to blow you around. Everybody needs a @friend. Let that @brush dance around there and play.
Be brave. I think there's an artist hidden in the bottom of every single one of us. All you need to paint is a few tools, a little instruction, and a vision in your mind. @Inspiration
La- da- da- da- dah. Just be @happy. Now let's put some happy little clouds in here. We'll do another happy little painting.
Let your @heart take you to wherever you want to be. Let's make some @happy little clouds in our world.

Didn't you know you had that much power? You can move mountains. You can do @anything. We might as well make some Almighty mountains @today as well, what the heck. Steve wants reflections, so let's give him reflections. @Inspiration
God gave you this gift of @imagination. Use it. Let your imagination just wonder around when you're doing these things.
It's a good way of getting rid of all your anxieties and hostilities. @Inspiration

In @nature, dead trees are just as normal as live trees. Each highlight must have it's own private shadow. If it's not what you want - stop and change it. Don't just keep going and expect it will get better.
We'll play with clouds @today. It's cold, but it's beautiful.
We have no limits to our world. We're only limited by our @imagination.
Don't be bashful drop me a line. @encouragement
Let's have a @happy little tree in here. Let's give him a friend too. Everybody needs a @friend.
How do you make a round circle with a square knife? That's your @challenge for the day. If we're gonna walk though the woods, we need a little path.
This painting comes right out of your @heart. You can create the world you want to see and be a part of. You have that power.
A fan @brush can be your best @friend. Now, we're going to fluff this cloud. Now we can begin working on lots of @happy little things.
